stanza.line: Thy glass will show thee how thy beauties wearwear
Thy dial how thy precious minutes wastewaste
These vacant leaves thy mind imprint will bearbear
And of this book this learning mayst thou tastetaste
The wrinkles which thy glass will truly showshow
Of mouthed graves will give thee memorymemory
Thou by thy dial shady stealth mayst knowknow
Look what thy memory cannot containcontain
Commit to these waste blanks and thou shalt findfind
Those children nursed delivered from thy brainbrain
To take a new acquaintance of thy mindmind
These offices so oft as thou wilt looklook
Shall profit thee and much enrich thy bookbook
